last_episode_to_air.name: Candlenights & Vape Ape
last_episode_to_air.overview: The McElroy Brothers plan to help a viewer with a vaping problem, but they get sidetracked when the holiday, Candlenights, suddenly arrives.

name: My Brother, My Brother and Me
original_name: My Brother, My Brother and Me
overview: The McElroy brothers are not experts, and their advice should never be followed. Justin, Travis, and Griffin are three brothers from Huntington, West Virginia who have turned their popular comedy podcast into an advice show that frequently spins out of control and barely offers any advice.

episodes.name: Dorms & Ghoulsmashing
episodes.overview: The McElroy brothers get a letter from someone who is worried that their college dorm room might be filled with haunted artifacts. So, the brothers go ghoul hunting.

episodes.name: Resumes & Jamiroquai's Dad
episodes.overview: The McElroy Brothers get a letter from a viewer who is concerned about padding their resume. So, the brothers attempt to reclaim Griffin's lost job.

episodes.name: Tarantulas & Travis Did a Hit
episodes.overview: The McElroy Brothers try convince a viewerâ€™s wife to let him get a tarantula. So, the brothers pull out all of the stops to rebrand the mighty tarantula. Travis commits a violent act.

episodes.name: Teens & Your Least Favorite Soda
episodes.overview: The McElroy Brothers mentor local teens in an effort to help a teacher learn how to connect with her students. While Justin and Travis work to understand their youths, Griffin invents a kid-friendly experience to get teens to stop using their phones.

episodes.name: Secret Societies & Apologies to Nathan
episodes.overview: The McElroy brothers' search for secret societies in Huntington, WV takes them too close to the truth. With the help of the Huntington Blues Society, the brothers reach out to the Knights Templar, try on robes, and launch their very own secret society.

episodes.name: Candlenights & Vape Ape
episodes.overview: The McElroy Brothers plan to help a viewer with a vaping problem, but they get sidetracked when the holiday, Candlenights, suddenly arrives.
